name: Super Toaster Shooter
description:
Description:

In an uncertain future something has gone wrong and zombies are filling the streets of your city. Luckily, you recently bought a 3D printer toaster and you have hacked it with a killer firmware (with your mad science skills) that will save the whole city shooting pairs of toasts like crazy!

Controls:

PC controls: Arrows for moving + WASD (or ZQSD if you are AZERTY) for aiming.

Mobile controls: Touch in the direction where you want to go and the toasts will be aimed in the last direction you moved.

Credits:

Music ("Epic Soundtrack Song") from http://pennpierson.com/music.php

Toaster sounds from http://www.freesfx.co.uk/

Other sounds made with http://www.bfxr.net/

This game is part of the #js48 game jam and was made with Phaser.
